name: Peach
description: A sweet and juicy stone fruit with a velvety skin.

name: Lime
description: A small, green citrus fruit with a tart flavor.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, tangy flesh.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet, orange flesh and a large pit.

name: Tangerine
description: A small, sweet citrus fruit with a loose, easy-to-peel skin.

name: Blueberries
description: Small, round berries with a sweet and slightly tart flavor.

name: Tomato
description: A red or yellowish fruit with a juicy interior, often used as a vegetable.

name: Watermelon
description: A large fruit with a hard green rind and sweet, juicy red flesh.

name: Cherries
description: Small, round stone fruits with a sweet or tart flavor.

name: Grapes
description: Small, round fruits that grow in clusters and can be sweet or tart.

name: Apple
description: A sweet or tart fruit with a crisp flesh and various skin colors.

name: Pear
description: A sweet fruit with a soft, grainy texture and a green or yellow skin.

name: Avocado
description: A creamy fruit with a large seed and a green, pebbly skin.

name: Melon
description: A large, juicy fruit with a sweet flesh and a hard rind.

name: Lemon
description: A yellow citrus fruit with a tart flavor, often used for its juice.

name: Banana
description: A long, curved fruit with a soft, sweet flesh and a yellow peel.

name: Strawberry
description: A sweet, red fruit with a juicy texture and small seeds on the surface.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, brown fruit with a bright green, tangy flesh.

name: Eggplant
description: A dark purple fruit with a spongy flesh, commonly used as a vegetable in cooking.

name: Coconut
description: A tropical fruit with a hard, fibrous shell and sweet, milky interior.
